member.name: P:Intelledox.Extension.ExtensionBase.GlobalSettingIdentity
member.summary: Returns the identity that is registered in Manage for global configuration settings. This identity may be shared between different extensions for shared settings.

member.summary: Returns the list of available global settings for this extension

member.name: P:Intelledox.Extension.GlobalSetting.DefaultValue
member.summary: When a custom value has not been entered in Manage this value is used as the default. Leave null for no default.
